thread.section_title: Bitbond Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Bitbond | www.bitbond.com
thread.title: Stepan Pernica

author: Stepan Pernica
title: Stepan Pernica
text:
I invest on many platforms, but this platform is the worst. Half of your invested funds are stolen by thiefs, half of it returns in long horizon. There is no buyback guarantee and loans are only few. As an investor, you don't know, what's happen with every loan. And debt agency gets 20-30 percent of stake...?!
They are not cared about investors at all. Just read angry comments on everybody profiles before you invest here. Their responsibilities are nothing - read in Terms and conditions - all risk is on investors.
I read references on TrustPilot and they are absolutely out - Nobody is talking about how much percent they actually make from this investments... I lost there so far about 70% of what I invest! Looks like for me, this company makes their own reviews. Don't trust them!
